dance.name: Two Blue Clouds in the Grey Sky
dance.author: Claire Cunin and Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
dance.kind: 40-bar reel for five couples in a five-couple longwise set
dance.editor-details:
There exists a three-couple version of this dance, named “One Blue Cloud in
the Grey Sky”.

instructions.content:
1st and 3rd couples set, cast off one place and dance a half figure of
eight around 2nd and 4th couples. 2nd and 4th couples step up on bars 3-4.

1st and 3rd couples set, dance a half figure of eight around 4th and 5th
couples and set advancing to finish facing first corners, 4th woman and
2nd man for 1st couple, 5th woman and 4th man for 3rd couple.

1st and 3rd couples dance corner pass and turn with their first corners
and repeat with their second, third and fourth corners, finishing on their
own sides in second and fourth positions.

1st and 3rd couples set, cast off one place. 4th and 5th couples step up
on bars 35-36. 1st and 3rd couples turn right hand in four bars.
